categories: Category:Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire star systems

nodes.text: The Had Abbadon system was a star system located within the galaxy's Deep Core that contained Had Abbadon, a mythical "lost planet" that some Jedi scholars believed might have been the birthplace of the Jedi Order. By the year 137 ABY, it had fallen under the control of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire.

The Had Abbadon system was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace that was released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square L-10.
